alert.note: Alert for Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 25 at 4:28PM PST until December 27 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one-quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern Sacramento Valley. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, from 8 PM this evening to 11 AM PST Monday. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
